statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT article_title, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL';
SELECT article_id, article_content FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT distinct stock_symbol FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE article_id=12345;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.9
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM sentiment_analysis
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY article_id DESC
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL'
SELECT * FROM stock_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT stock_symbol, article_title FROM stock_sentiments WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date_published = '2022-09-15';
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM stock_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC, article_title DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM stock_sentiments GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3;
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date_published = '2022-01-15';

SELECT article_title, sentiment_score, price FROM stock_sentiments s JOIN stock_prices p ON s.stock_symbol = p.stock_symbol WHERE sentiment_score > 0.4 AND price > 100 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_articles, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM stock_sentiments GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING total_articles > 3 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockSentiment;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name FROM StockSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT stock_name, sentiment_score FROM StockSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM Article WHERE article_title LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT stock_name, stock_symbol FROM Stock ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT stock_name, sentiment_score FROM StockSentiment
SELECT * FROM StockSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT article_content FROM Article WHERE LENGTH(article_content) > 1000
SELECT stock_name, stock_symbol FROM Stock ORDER BY stock_name ASC
SELECT stock_name, article_title FROM StockSentiment JOIN Article ON StockSentiment.article_id = Article.article_id
SELECT * FROM stock_news_articles;
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM stock_news_articles WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL';
SELECT article_content FROM stock_news_articles WHERE article_id=123;
SELECT article_title, publish_date, stock_symbol FROM stock_news_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM stock_news_articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM stock_news_articles WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_sentiment_scores ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM stock_details WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ';
SELECT article_title, sentiment_category FROM stock_news_articles JOIN stock_sentiment_scores ON stock_news_articles.article_id = stock_sentiment_scores.article_id;
SELECT decision_date, action_taken FROM trade_decisions WHERE decision_reason LIKE '%market%'
SELECT * FROM stock_sentiments;
SELECT article_id, sentiment_score, publication_date FROM stock_sentiments WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM stock_sentiments ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, company_name, industry FROM stock_information WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT article_id, content, word_count FROM article_content WHERE word_count > 500;
SELECT * FROM stock_sentiments
SELECT article_id, stock_symbol, sentiment_score FROM stock_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT publication_date, author_name FROM stock_sentiments ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, current_price, previous_day_price FROM stock_performance WHERE current_price > previous_day_price
SELECT stock_symbol, company_name, industry FROM stock_information
